Come to the tropical Caribbean paradise. The pristine beaches and a barrier reef offer world renowned diving. Unspoiled rain forests, mystical Maya temples and more awaiting you to discover! Tiger Point is located in Southern Lagoon in the central coastal region. From the international airport in Belize, it is a one and a half hour trip either by water or by road. Actor Leonardo DiCaprio purchased a 104 acres island off the coast of Belize more than 10 years ago for 1.75 million. DiCaprio is helping design a new resort called Blackadore Caye, a restorative island, slated to open in late 2018. Tiger Point will be 100% powered by renewable solar energy and use filtered on-site rainwater.
Realtor Remarks: Belize is an English speaking central American nation, south of Mexico on the shores of the Caribbean Sea. It is recognized Worldwide as being one of the best tax havens for safe offshore banking. Address: Tiger Point, Southern Lagoon, Manatee, Belize District, Belize.
